title: Was Chosen for PBE but it wont let me sign up
body: I got an email a few weeks ago that said I could be a PBE tester so I tried to sign up and it said there was an error so I waited for a few weeks and it is still showing that there is an error. Now I don't know what to do since I really wanted to do the PBE. Is this happening to anybody else or does anybody know why it would do that?

replies.body:
Sometimes things can go belly-up when trying to access this page if it isn't accessed properly. First, I'd recommend logging out of the League page completely, then visiting the [NA Landing page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/) to login from there, and afterward, visit the [NA PBE Signup Page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Let me know if this worked for you!
